front.title: AIEE Standards for Fuses Above 600 Volts

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This Standard applies to the following types of devices designed for operation above 600 volts whether for indoor or outdoor service. (a) Fuses (see paragraph 25-50). (b) Fuse cutouts (see paragraph 25-64). (c) Fuse parts of combined equipment.
